title: Ear with Hearing Aid
description: An ear shown with a hearing aid, worn by a person with hearing loss. The style shown in Behind The Ear (BTE), but this can represent any form of hearing aid.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the ear with hearing aid emoji is meticulously detailed, featuring a naturalistic skin tone rendered with soft rounded edges and subtle highlights that suggest a healthy, realistic form. The hearing aid itself is depicted with a subtle metallic sheen and precise contours, showcasing Apple's commitment to clarity and accessibility. This emoji thoughtfully represents hearing, communication, and support for those who use assistive devices, conveying understanding and inclusion.
